message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your life or business. Given its value and the fact that it's worth $8,000 to you, I am proposing to sell it to you for $7,200. This offer represents a significant savings for you while ensuring a fair return for me. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you have any questions. I look forward to your positive response.
